articles.author: Sebastian Kettley
articles.title: World's longest earthquake lasted 32 years - and may have killed thousands of people - Daily Express
articles.description: AN EARTHQUAKE lasting more than 30 years may have been responsible for killing thousands of people on the Indonesian island of Sumatra in 1861, new research has shown.

articles.author: Amar Mehta
articles.title: NASA release striking picture of Milky Way's 'downtown', 26,000 light years away - Sky News
articles.description: The galactic centre showing billions of stars was pieced together over two decades by NASA's Chandra X-ray observatory.

articles.author: Sebastian Kettley
articles.title: Israeli archaeologists unveil 'Solomon's Seal' - an ancient amulet protecting from evil - Daily Express
articles.description: ISRAELI archaeologists have unveiled the discovery of a 1,500-year-old amulet believed to have once protected women and children from evil spirits.

articles.author: RT
articles.title: Old rover looks at clouds: NASA’s Curiosity detects unusual atmospheric phenomena on Mars in pics of dry-ice puffs over Red Planet - RT
articles.description: The Curiosity rover has captured images of highly unusual atmospheric phenomena on Mars unlike anything on Earth – clouds that form so high that they mostly consist of crystalized CO2 instead of water.
articles.content: Our neighboring planet is a dry, icy desert, but it still has some clouds in its thin atmosphere and they form often enough to affect its climate. Martian clouds differ from what we are used to on Ea… [+1813 chars]

articles.title: Climate change: warming effect of greenhouse gases 'has been overestimated', ice core study suggests - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ice cores from Antarctica, which have trapped within ancient soot particles from Africa, Australia and South America, were analysed by Harvard-led researchers, revealing a smokier past than thought.
articles.content:
Antarctic ice has revealed that pre-industrial air pollution was worse than thought, suggesting climate models have overstated the warming from greenhouse gases.
